context_bundle.summary: Istio is a service mesh providing traffic management, security, and observability for microservices through sidecar proxies

onboarding.quick_start: istioctl install --set profile=demo -y && kubectl get pods -n istio-system && kubectl label namespace default istio-injection=enabled
common_patterns: Installation: istioctl install --set profile=demo -y for quick setup
Sidecar injection: kubectl label namespace <namespace> istio-injection=enabled
Traffic management: kubectl apply -f destination-rule.yaml && kubectl apply -f virtual-service.yaml
mTLS enforcement: PeerAuthentication resource with mtls.mode=STRICT
Observability: istioctl dashboard prometheus && istioctl dashboard grafana
Gateway configuration: Gateway resource with port 80 for HTTP ingress
known_errors: Sidecar injection failed: 'kubectl label namespace default istio-injection=enabled --overwrite' and restart pods
mTLS handshake error: 'istioctl authn tls check' and verify ServiceEntry/PeerAuthentication configuration
Gateway 503 errors: 'istioctl proxy-config routes <pod>' and verify Gateway/VirtualService selectors
Resource exhaustion: 'kubectl top pods -n istio-system' and increase resource.limits for istio-proxy sidecars
